points.title: Elegant & Beautiful
points.description: Enjoy a beautifully designed console that enhances the modern look of your interiors. Designed with enriching materials, ensuring durability.

points.title: Simple & Modern UI
points.description: A modern interface with 4K Ultra HD graphics. With added accessibility features, everyone can enjoy games without any obstacles.

points.title: Speed & Optimization
points.description: Developed with next generation performance optimizers, making sure that your game is smooth and beautiful at every frame, at all times.

points.title: Security & Backup
points.description: The console provides a powerful security system with antivirus, Web Protection and Payment Security, protecting you at every step.

points.title: Storage & Memory
points.description: The playstation ships with a 1TB SSD and a 16GB GDDR6 memory chip to make sure your games load and play faster and smoother than ever.

points.title: Clean & Modern
points.description: The console shows off a simple yet beautiful design. With a powerful cooling system at the top, and a solid cage like armour all over.

points.title: Modern & Beautiful UI
points.description: The user interface is designed to keep you engaged with smooth animations while still maintaining its simple and modern design.

points.title: Steady & Powerful Engine
points.description: Integrated with the DDR6 memory card and a 1TB SDD, the console is powered to store and run multiple games and applications at once.

points.title: Security & Backup
points.description: Equipped with a strong security system that prevents all kinds of attacks. With added antivirus, Web Protection and Payment Security Systems.

points.title: Storage & Memory
points.description: The Xbox Series X ships with a 1TB SSD and a 16GB GDDR6 memory chip. With the RDNA2 graphics card, experience breathtaking game play.

points.title: Modern & Elegant
points.description: The controller has a beautiful modern design with integrated sensors and feedback systems, to enhance your gaming experience.

points.title: Reactive Vibrations
points.description: The controller is equipped with sensors all around its body which react to game play triggers. Feel every pixel with every exploring touch.

points.title: Responsive Audio
points.description: Equipped with responsive audio systems, the volume and intensity of the sound effects can dynamically change for different actions.

points.title: Motion Detection
points.description: With motion detecting sensors, you can now control various aspects of your game with reactive tilts and swift movements.

points.title: Beautiful & Sleek
points.description: Along with its clean and sleek design, it is integrated with multiple sensors, feedback and audio systems to enhance game play.

points.title: Reactive Triggers
points.description: The controller can dynamically vibrate and react at different intensities to various trigger inputs, engaging the gamer at every touch.

points.title: Responsive Audio Cues
points.description: The controller responds to every action by providing audio cues to enhance the motion and provide an instantaneous feedback.

points.title: Enhanced Motion Sensors
points.description: With certain controller tilts and gestures you can provide special inputs that effect the game at realtime enhancing your realtime experience.

points.title: Focused & Sensory
points.description: The headset offer a spatial surround sound system, with noise cancellation, that helps in capturing even the minute sound effects.

points.title: Hidden Microphones
points.description: The headset has dual hidden microphones with in-built commands that allows you to access features of the headset verbally and with ease.

points.title: Features & Accessibility
points.description: The headset has multiple features including the Game and Music Mode. With the accessibility features, everyone can enjoy these headsets.

points.title: Battery Life
points.description: Enjoy an easy 12 hours of wireless battery life with the rechargeable in-built batteries. Compatible with PS4, Windows, MacOS & Linux.

points.title: Audio & Visualization
points.description: These wired headsets deliver high quality audio waves which can detect every little sound effect with a very high level of accuracy.

points.title: Crystal Clear Chats
points.description: The headset has focused mic isolation to capture your voice perfectly and reduce background noise. With added layers of static cleansing.

points.title: Voice Your Style
points.description: There are multiple options and tweaks available to help you pick the perfect configuration for the best gaming or leisure experience.

points.title: Lightweight Armor
points.description: The headset is made of durable materials while still offering a very lightweight and comfortable feel, with a clean and intuitive design.
